mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SECRETARY_FRIDGE_FOOD (FOOD_ID, FOOD_NAME, FRIDGE_ID, FOOD_QUANTITY, FOOD_CATEGORY, FOOD_INPUT_DATE, FOOD_PURCHASE_DATE, FOOD_MADE_DATE, FOOD_EXPIRY_DATE, FOOD_PRICE, FOOD_ORIGINAL_FILE, FOOD_SAVED_FILE) VALUES (FRIDGE_FOOD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{foodName}, #{fridgeId}, #{foodQuantity}, #{foodCategory}, #{foodInputDate}, #{foodPurchaseDate}, #{foodMadeDate}, #{foodExpiryDate}, #{foodPrice}, #{foodOriginalFile}, #{foodSavedFile})
